imdb.plot outline: Tota Tiwari (Gaurav Gera) is the youngest of the colorful family of Tiwari Sadan. On the day of his wedding, his bride to be (Samiksha Bhatt) gets swapped by another bride in a mass marriage ceremony. He accidentally marries Maina Shukla (Kavita Kaushik), from Allahabad. The elders believe that it is destiny and welcome the new bride into their home. The show chronicles Tota's personal journey in this mad house.
imdb.title: Tota Weds Maina
plot: Tota Tiwari ('Gaurav Gera' (qv)) is the youngest of the colorful family of Tiwari Sadan. On the day of his wedding, his bride to be ('Samiksha Bhatt' (qv)) gets swapped by another bride in a mass marriage ceremony. He accidentally marries Maina Shukla ('Kavita Kaushik' (qv)), from Allahabad. The elders believe that it is destiny and welcome the new bride into their home. The show chronicles Tota's personal journey in this mad house.
